data.title: VENUS ON THE HALF-SHELL AND OTHERS
data.meta_description: Burton, Michigan: Subterranean Press, 2008. First Edition. Hardcover. Signed by illustrator Bob Eggleton on the half-title. A collection of the best writing from Farmer's fictional-author period, including the controversial Kilgore Trout novel. Octavo. Original light blue cloth binding, with metallic blue titles. The bottom corners are very lightly bumped; else fine in a fine dust jacket. Fine / Fine. Item #71164 ISBN:
data.text:
Farmer, Philip Jose

Burton, Michigan: Subterranean Press, 2008. First Edition. Hardcover. Signed by illustrator Bob Eggleton on the half-title. A collection of the best writing from Farmer's "fictional-author period," including the controversial Kilgore Trout novel. Octavo. Original light blue cloth binding, with metallic blue titles. The bottom corners are very lightly bumped; else fine in a fine dust jacket. Fine / Fine. Item #71164

ISBN: 9781596061422
